page.title: 10Living in Warsop.
page.content: Mrs.R.works in our school and has lived in Warsop all her life.She likes Warsop for many reasons.She can buy everything she needs in Warsop from small household items to furniture! Her milk and papers are delivered by local traders.She can cash cheques at the bank and post letters or buy stamps at the Post Office.Mrs.R.can pay her rates at the Council Offices. If she is ill or has toothache she can visit the Health Centre or the Dental Surgery.Mrs.R.goes weekly to the hairdresser's and even books her holidays abroad at a local travel agency. There are also leisure facilities in Warsop but Mrs.R.does not use them, like the tennis courts,the B.M.X.track the swimming pool and the roller disco!
